name: otf2
description:
The Open Trace Format 2 is a highly scalable, memory efficient event
trace data format plus support library.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: autoconf
dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: automake
dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: ravel
dependent_to.description:
Ravel is a parallel communication trace visualization tool that orders
events according to logical time.

dependent_to.name: tau
dependent_to.description:
A portable profiling and tracing toolkit for performance analysis of
parallel programs written in Fortran, C, C++, UPC, Java, Python.

dependent_to.name: hpx
dependent_to.description: C++ runtime system for parallel and distributed applications.

dependent_to.name: tracer
dependent_to.description: Trace Replay and Network Simulation Framework

dependent_to.name: scalasca
dependent_to.description:
Scalasca is a software tool that supports the performance optimization
of parallel programs by measuring and analyzing their runtime behavior.
The analysis identifies potential performance bottlenecks - in
particular those concerning communication and synchronization - and
offers guidance in exploring their causes.

dependent_to.name: sst-elements
dependent_to.description:
SST Elements implements a range of components for performing
architecture simulation from node-level to system-level using the SST
discrete event core.

dependent_to.name: vite
dependent_to.description:
ViTE is a trace explorer. It is a tool to visualize execution traces in
Paje or OTF2 format for debugging and profiling parallel or distributed
applications.

dependent_to.name: sst-macro
dependent_to.description:
The Structural Simulation Toolkit Macroscale Element Library simulates
large-scale parallel computer architectures for the coarse-grained study
of distributed-memory applications. The simulator is driven from either
a trace file or skeleton application. SST/macro's modular architecture
can be extended with additional network models, trace file formats,
software services, and processor models.

dependent_to.name: eztrace
dependent_to.description:
EZTrace is a tool to automatically generate execution traces of HPC
applications.

dependent_to.name: scorep
dependent_to.description:
The Score-P measurement infrastructure is a highly scalable and easy-to-
use tool suite for profiling, event tracing, and online analysis of HPC
applications.
